About Me

I'm a web developer focused on crafting clean, user-friendly experiences.

I love research, creating things, and using technology to connect people to resources within their communities. I have experience with JavaScript, React, NodeJS.

In a previous career, I was an educational consultant empowering parents to become effective advocates for their children. After years of helping vulnerable clients in our fragile mental health care system, I completed an application for the first-ever Grow with Google Developer Challenge and was awarded a scholarship for Udacityâ€™s Front-End Nanodegree program.

I completed the Nanodegree and moved on to a full-stack computer science program that covered all aspects of web development including MERN stack, Java, algorithms, data structures, Agile and more. as a software developer at a company where I can learn, grow, and continue to master the craft.
